Package be.hogent.tarsos.dsp.filters

package be.hogent.tarsos.dsp.filters
This package contains a couple of filters (low and highpass).
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    be.hogent.tarsos.dsp
    Contains classes to handle sampled sound.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BandPass
    A band pass filter is a filter that filters out all frequencies except for those in a band centered on the current frequency of the filter.
    HighPass
    A High pass IIR filter.
    IIRFilter
    An Infinite Impulse Response, or IIR, filter is a filter that uses a set of coefficients and previous filtered values to filter a stream of audio.
    LowPassFS
    Four stage low pass filter.
    LowPassSP
    Single pass low pass filter.
